description: The Hydrolic Water Pumping initiative in Kenya addresses the critical challenge of water scarcity faced by many communities. By utilizing a simple, gravity-driven pump system, it provides a sustainable solution for accessing clean water without the need for expensive energy sources. This project aims to alleviate the burden on women and children who often travel long distances for water, ultimately improving their quality of life and supporting agricultural activities in arid regions.
name: Hydrolic Water Pumping
